snippet: South Korea said it was open to discussing bringing finished goods and raw materials from an industrial park  that had been jointly operated until North Korea withdrew all its workers and the South pulled its citizens.
abstract: South Korea proposes border meeting with North Korea to discuss retrieval of finished goods and raw materials stranded in abandoned Kaesong Industrial Complex, industrial park that was run jointly by two countries but has sat idle since spat between countries caused withdrawal of workers.
lead_paragraph: South Korea said it was open to discussing bringing finished goods and raw materials from an industrial park  that had been jointly operated until North Korea withdrew all its workers and the South pulled its citizens.

headline.seo: South Korea Proposes Border Meeting With North
headline.main: South Korea Proposes Meeting With North
headline.print_headline: South Korea Proposes Meeting With North
